REDIRECT_HTTP_TO_HTTPS.help: Redirect all HTTP request to HTTPS.
REDIRECT_HTTP_TO_HTTPS.label: Redirect HTTP to HTTPS

AUTO_REDIRECT_HTTP_TO_HTTPS.help: Try to detect if HTTPS is used and activate HTTP to HTTPS redirection if that's the case.
AUTO_REDIRECT_HTTP_TO_HTTPS.label: Auto redirect HTTP to HTTPS

SSL_PROTOCOLS.help: The supported version of TLS. We recommend the default value TLSv1.2 TLSv1.3 for compatibility reasons.
SSL_PROTOCOLS.label: HTTPS protocols

SSL_CIPHERS_LEVEL.help: Preset security level for SSL cipher suites. 'Modern' is most secure but may not work with older devices.
SSL_CIPHERS_LEVEL.label: SSL Ciphers Level

SSL_CIPHERS_CUSTOM.help: Custom SSL cipher suite string. If specified, overrides the SSL Ciphers Level. Leave empty to use level-based configuration.
SSL_CIPHERS_CUSTOM.label: Custom SSL Ciphers

SSL_SESSION_CACHE_SIZE.help: Size of the SSL session cache (e.g., '10m' for 10 megabytes, '512k' for 512 kilobytes). Set to 'off' or 'none' to disable session caching.
SSL_SESSION_CACHE_SIZE.label: SSL Session Cache Size
